name: MangoDesk
long_description:
We help AI teams accelerate the creation of evals and post-training data by creating bespoke data annotation pipelines in seconds and staffing them with the right domain experts.

AGI requires expert-created data and evals across domains, quickly and at volumes. Creating this data reliably is a complex operational challenge. We solve this end-to-end. 

Ankith was previously an engineer at Scale AI where he built the infrastructure for expert sourcing/screening and Gen AI data labeling operations, and Ananth previously founded a software firm with seven-figure revenue and Fortune 500 customers.
one_liner: Simple platform to create data for AI

name: Halluminate
long_description:
We help foundation model labs and enterprises train computer use AI with data and sandboxes.

A knowledge worker spends 90% of their day on a computer. A productive AI agent must similarly learn how to use our computers, browsers, and software to deliver real world value. 

Today, browser and computer use AI is inaccurate, slow, and expensive. Model labs and enterprises who want to improve these agents are bottlenecked by two resources: 

1) High quality datasets for benchmarking and evaluations
2) Realistic sandbox environments for safe and accurate testing/training (ex. a simulated version of Salesforce) 

Halluminate offers a suite of products and services to address both these issues. 

Our evaluation service combines proprietary datasets with high quality annotations to help our customers identify and prioritize the biggest failure modes of their computer- and browser- use AI. 

Our platform provides a catalog of fully managed sandboxes, empowering our customers to safely and accurately test/train at scale, resulting in improved performance. 

Our customers see
- Improved browser- and computer-use agent performance
- New and emergent frontier agent capabilities
- Data driven prioritization leading to exponentially faster development speed
- Increased revenue/sales via marketing from public benchmarks

Our paying customers already include leading computer use model labs and the two largest browser agent companies in the space. 

Wyatt and Jerry are friends that met their first week of school studying CS at Cornell University. They’ve been working and studying together for 7+ years.
one_liner: Data and RL environments to automate knowledge work

name: TraceRoot.AI
long_description: TraceRoot.AI is the first open source AI agent that monitors production environments and automatically fixes bugs. It connects to telemetry data like traces, logs, metrics and repo to analyze and auto-resolve bugs.
one_liner: Open source AI agents auto-fix your production bugs

name: AgentMail
long_description: AgentMail is the email inbox API for AI agents. It gives agents their own email inboxes, like Gmail does for humans.
one_liner: Email Inboxes for AI Agents

name: truthsystems
long_description:
Truth Systems provides a compliance agent to govern the use of generative AI. It translates operational policies into intelligent, real-time guardrails that monitor every AI interaction. This empowers companies to proactively block non-compliant actions and align access to AI tools with user competency. By eliminating the risks and operational blind spots associated with uncontrolled AI adoption, our platform enables enterprises to fully leverage the technology's potential without compromising security. 

We are establishing the new standard for AI governance, building a future where every professional can innovate safely and confidently.
one_liner: Automatically blocking risky behavior with real-time governance agents

name: Blank Bio
long_description:
Blank Bio builds foundation models that understand RNA, the language of life. Our model powers applications across the entire R&D pipeline, from designing better drugs to running smarter clinical trials. 

Our first model is state-of-the-art in mRNA property prediction. It simulates costly experiments, helping partners design more effective mRNA medicines faster and cheaper. Our open-source models are being used by Sanofi & GSK. We’re also collaborating with the Arc Institute to bring our RNA embeddings into the next generation of virtual cell models. 

mRNA design is just the beginning. As the model improves, we’re extending to applications like target ID, novel biomarker discovery, patient stratification, and more. We’ve spent decades applying machine learning to biology across academia (PhDs at the University of Toronto) and industry (Recursion, Deep Genomics, Amazon). 

Contact us to learn more: founders@blank.bio
one_liner: RNA-based AI for better drugs and smarter clinical trials.

name: Lanesurf
long_description:
Lanesurf helps freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best prices by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.

Our self-improving voice AI stack is built for the messy reality of logistics - noisy calls, compliance checks, constant exceptions and turns them into faster bookings at better margins.

With each booking, the AI learns from aggregated, anonymized lane and pricing data. As more customers use Lanesurf, this learning compounds, driving faster bookings at the best prices and powering a voice-driven freight marketplace.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: Verne Robotics
long_description: We build AI models for controlling robot arms, enabling them to learn new skills in just hours. Our robots help businesses cut costs by automating back-of-house tasks with an innovative  pay-by-the-hour business model. Our customers include a biotech unicorn, a leading biotech non-profit, and a direct to consumer apparel brand.
one_liner: AI models that teach robots new skills in hours

name: EffiGov
long_description: EffiGov is building an AI OS for local governments. We've started with AI call operators that answer 311 and departmental lines 24/7 - handling everything from permit applications to animal control.
one_liner: The AI OS for Cities

name: Orange Slice
long_description: Orange Slice is a spreadsheet where every column is TypeScript—and AI writes it for you. Describe what you want in chat ("find the CEO's LinkedIn and get their email"), and we generate the code, create the columns, and run it across thousands of rows. Our fully-typed SDK has 100+ enrichments built in: LinkedIn, contact info, company data, web scraping, AI research. Columns automatically execute in dependency order. No workflow builders—just describe it or code it.
one_liner: Agentic sales enrichment spreadsheet

name: Wafer
long_description:
Every successful tool is a bet on efficiency. A waterwheel grinds more grain per unit effort than a quern. A transistor switches more operations per watt than a vacuum tube. This is civilization's pattern: do more work with less energy.

For ten thousand years, efficiency meant physical work. Intellectual work rode the surplus. Better farming, manufacturing, transport. But the brain itself bottlenecked every intellectual task.

Compute changes this. For the first time, we can drive efficiency gains in intellectual work directly. Any repeatable job with measurable output has an efficiency ratio. Useful work divided by energy consumed. Intelligence per watt.

Humans perform tasks at some quality-weighted outcomes per kilowatt-hour. AI systems do the same jobs. We can measure both the same way. AI is crossing the human baseline. Domain after domain.

The world's hardest problems are information problems, and human intelligence is no longer the limit. The cost of intelligence per unit of energy is the limit. Every order of magnitude drop in cost expands the set of solvable problems.

Our mission at Wafer is to maximize intelligence per watt by using AI to optimize AI infrastructure, achieving thousands of times better energy and cost efficiency.

We want people to do their life's work here in pursuit of radical abundance. We believe cheap intelligence is the most essential piece of technology for a future of abundance. We will build the future with intelligence "too cheap to meter."
one_liner: AI that makes AI fast

name: Imprezia
long_description: The first advertising infrastructure designed specifically for AI apps. Seamlessly integrate contextual brands & products that enhance user experience while generating revenue to pay the inference bills.
one_liner: The World's First AI Ad Network.

name: OnDeck AI
long_description:
OnDeck is the infrastructure layer that makes Vision Language Models accessible and scalable for enterprise. We let organizations instantly find any object, behavior or event, in any footage, without needing to train a model or collect any training data.

The Pain: Creating vision models usually takes months: collecting training data, training, then deployment.  Worse yet: 
+ it’s often impossible to get enough data for a specific task, and 
+ even the best cv models struggle to generalize across diverse camera setups, workflows and environments. 

To overcome these blockers, we bet early on the power of VLMs and built a vision engine that can generalize across any task and doesn’t need any training data. We published a NeurIPS workshop paper showing our new methods with VLMs beat traditional CV even at niche tasks.

Our current customers include:
- National Defense Organizations
- Robotics Research
- Security cameras
- Behaviour analysis for port monitoring
- Off-shore oil & gas monitoring
one_liner: Analyze any footage, without training a model

name: DeepGrove
one_liner: Frontier Intelligence. On Any Device.

name: Keystone
long_description: Keystone is an AI engineer that joins your team and understands your product from codebase to production. It can triage tickets, fix bugs, and automatically resolve incidents, autonomously.

long_description:
DeepAware builds an AI-driven automation system for GPU-intensive data centers. Our reinforcement-learning scheduler, real-time market integration, and unified dashboard slice energy waste by up to 30%. Coming soon: autonomous “robot-hand” inspections and maintenance to enable 24/7 operations with minimal staff.

More info: https://deepawareai.com/
Jobs/Internship: https://www.deepawareai.com/careers

name: CareSwift
long_description: CareSwift is a real-time AI assistant built directly into ambulance reporting systems, guiding medics as they document care and instantly flagging errors. Crews complete accurate, compliant reports in under three minutes, cutting documentation time by 80 percent and helping agencies avoid insurance claim denials. Ambulance crews lose valuable time completing reports after each call. Even minor mistakes cause insurance claims to be rejected.

name: AgentHub
long_description:
AgentHub helps you catch and fix errors in your AI agents - before your users ever see them.

Simulate real-world scenarios in curated RL environments for your agents - trace, evaluate, and improve agent behavior at scale. Generate large annotated datasets and experiment with different prompts, models, and configurations - all in one place - with clear visualizations of what’s working (and what’s not).

Built by a former tech lead from Apple’s Foundation Model Eval team and a product engineer from MIT with experience working on agents at startups, AgentHub makes it easy to integrate your use case and start improving your agents quickly.

Our streamlined onboarding process lets you get your agent eval environment up and running fast—no heavy lifting on your end.

Close the feedback loop and build better agents, faster - with confidence.
one_liner: The simulation and evaluation engine for AI agents

name: BootLoop
long_description: BootLoop is building the first AI agent to write and test firmware on real hardware. Existing AI coding assistants fail completely with embedded systems, but our agent ingests datasheets, schematics, and other design files to write firmware in your style and automatically test it on your hardware.
one_liner: Firmware in minutes, not months - rigorously tested on real hardware

name: Kalinda
long_description:
Kalinda helps class action law firms qualify potential cases in minutes with AI.

The nature of class action/mass torts involves thousands of cases for a single lawsuit. For every plaintiff (injured person), law firms involved in these cases compile everything from the products they used to the injuries they have. This data is extensive, granular, and buried deep in thousands of pages of medical, financial, and employment records and others.

Kalinda extracts, summarizes, and aggregates data from these records for attorneys with AI.

When scaled across an entire litigation, Kalinda works tirelessly and in parallel—turning a process that once took months into just a few hours. 

Kalinda provides firms with the equivalent manpower of hundreds of paralegals and legal nurses, allowing them to quickly determine which claimants are eligible and helping them file faster and in greater volume.

To date, we’ve processed 600k pages of records and are live with 2 of the largest plaintiff law firms in the U.S!
one_liner: Deep research for class action law firms

name: IronLedger.ai
long_description:
IronLedger provides AI agents for property accounting, starting with accounts payable. We eliminate more than $70K of accounting costs annually for over 35K multifamily units. Soon, we'll be providing end-to-end accounting services including automated billbacks, month-end close and bank reconciliation.

https://www.ironledger.ai/
one_liner: AI agents for property accounting
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: The Interface
long_description: The Interface enables anyone to create, interact, and share on the fly — from TV shows to games to movies. Drawing on deep expertise in realtime compute and simulation, we combine multimodal AI with the best of 3D simulation and modelling techniques, to deliver real-time experiences that are alive, interactive, and emergent.

name: Flai
long_description:
The problem we solve: 56% of dealership leads arrive after business hours, and most dealers lose these potential customers to competitors who happen to be available 24/7. Missing after-hours calls alone costs the average dealership $1M annually in lost revenue.

We built Flai to fix this - AI assistants that answer dealership calls 24/7, scheduling test drives, oil changes, or running outbound recall campaigns so no opportunity slips away.

The result: No more missed opportunities, no more losing customers to competitors.

Our founding team has built voice AI products at HappyRobot, scaled infrastructure at Uber for millions of users, and applied data science at Netflix to solve operational challenges.

We're not just answering phones, we're helping dealerships win in an AI-first world where availability determine who gets the sale.
one_liner: We Bring Customers to Your Dealership

name: Comena
long_description: We build AI agents that automate order processing for industrial distributors and manufacturers. Say goodbye to inside sales and customer service teams spending hours on manual data entry. Comena streamlines order and quote entry, from inbox to ERP, freeing up sales teams to focus on high-value activities and proactive selling.
one_liner: AI agents for distributors and manufacturers to automate order entry.

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Lovable, n8n and a database all in one platform

name: Nozomio
long_description:
Nozomio is a product lab building engineers for the age of AI.

As coding agents become ubiquitous, the real bottleneck shifts from “write code” to “know which code and docs to feed them.” Starting with the tool named Nia, the mission is to provide context enrichment through agentic research and indexing of any external codebase(-s) or documentation via MCP / API.

Nozomio started with Arlan's early frustration with the agentic coding ecosystem, especially around context and memory. After winning Product of the Day in February and raising pre-seed, Arlan moved to London and then to SF as a solo immigrant from Kazakhstan to build the future of software engineering. 

try nia at trynia .ai <3
one_liner: Context augmentation for agents

name: Solva
long_description: The domain specific AI for claims that gives leading insurers clarity and speed on the most complex claims
one_liner: Automates insurance claims and stops incorrect payouts

name: Perseus Defense
long_description:
Perseus Defense is building a mass-manufactured Counter UAS solution for the Department of Defense and Department of Homeland Security. Current solutions are one-to-one, too dangerous for use on U.S. soil, and orders of magntiude more expensive than the threats they defeat. Our self-guided missile platform is man-portable and multi-domain capable. It senses, engages, and eliminates threats with drastically reduced cost per engagement over existing kinetic solutions. 

Solving this critical national security problem requires understanding complex DoD needs along with actual rocket science including aerodynamics, guidance, navigation, control, and much more. Jason and Steve met at Penn State while they pursued their PhD and MS in aerospace engineering, respectively. Their past experiences designing space helicopters for NASA, making Boeing airliners land autonomously, controlling swarms of unmanned autonomous systems, teaching aerospace engineering at Stanford, winning multiple ONR and DOE engineering competitions, and founding an international drone competition makes them the perfect team to create transformative solutions protecting our service members. 

"If you build this, it will be mandatory equipment for every truck, boat, and convoy in the U.S. Military. We're talking thousands of units." - Former DoD Procurement Officer

The White House just released Executive Order, "Unleashing American Drone Dominance" which adds billions of dollars, government support, and streamlined regulations to enable the development of our product. 

Traction: 
Jason and Steve used more than 100 end-user interviews across the DoD and DHS to shape the product to something of critical need to both boots on the ground and DoD purchasers. In 8 short weeks following a strict 2-week design-build-test cycle, the team has gone through 4 major guided missile iterations with over 30 live-fire flight tests. They were invited to Ft. Hood to present their platform to the 1st Cavalry Division, and also briefed the Pentagon and U.S. congressmen on current U.S. vulnerabilities to advanced drone technology.  Perseus Defense is actively standing up cooperative research agreements with U.S. Army DEVCOM's Applied Research Laboratory, Aviation and Missile Center, Armaments Center, and High Performance Computing Modernization Program.
one_liner: America's Golden Dome for Drones

name: mcp-use
long_description:
mcp-use provides open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP to help dev teams quickly build and deploy custom AI agents with MCP servers. 
Our library has over 170,000 downloads and 7,000 stars, and is used by hundreds of engineers at big enterprises.
We provide a hosted and self-hosted platform that manages auth, access control, and multi-user environments for secure MCP agents deployment at scale.
one_liner: Open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP.

name: Relling
one_liner: RL and Data Infrastructure for Robotic World Models

name: Finto
long_description: Finto builds AI accounting software for enterprise finance teams. We automate the invoice-to-pay process from their email inbox to their ERP. Cutting out 80% of the accountants daily work in invoice recording, account coding and  invoice approvals.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprise finance teams

name: Iron Grid
one_liner: AI Insurance for hardware.

name: Risely AI
long_description:
Risely’s AI agents will form the new operating system for universities, improving retention, staff productivity, and efficiency. Our platform integrates directly into existing university systems (SIS, LMS, CRM), learns each institution’s unique workflows, and deploys specialized AI agents. This dramatically reduces the $735 billion universities spend annually on administrative labor, expands staff capacity without increasing headcount, and improves the student experience.

This hasn't been done before because university workflows require nuanced, autonomous judgment, exactly what agentic AI was designed to solve. Our team uniquely combines deep expertise in higher education, enterprise-scale AI, and regulated enterprise sales.

Sadia previously built Salesforce’s Education Cloud from scratch, creating the core Student Information System widely used across higher education. She deeply understands university operations and maintains trusted relationships with hundreds of higher-ed CIOs and Provosts.

Danial was one of DoorDash’s earliest engineers, where he architected and scaled complex systems from zero to billions of transactions, including their search, recommendation, and Voice AI platforms. He knows how to build robust AI solutions that reliably perform at enterprise scale. 

Shahryar was a GM at Airwallex, where he built the entire Americas business from 0 to 1 and drove 11x revenue growth.  He’s also a master closer, single-handedly securing over $17M in enterprise deals at NerdWallet.  He’s a relentless startup executor with deep expertise launching and scaling go-to-market machines in highly regulated industries.

We launched six weeks ago and are already at $8k MRR, growing 55% week-over-week -- one of the fastest ramps ever in higher ed. Universities urgently need solutions that expand labor capacity and efficiency, especially as they face unprecedented budget pressure and staffing shortages.

With unmatched buyer access, deep technical expertise, and rapid early traction, we are perfectly positioned to own this enormous market.
one_liner: AI agents that automate administrative work across college campuses.

name: Minimal AI
long_description: Minimal AI makes it easy for e-commerce brands to build and manage AI support teams that resolve 80%+ of tickets while increasing revenue.
one_liner: AI Agents for E-commerce Customer Support

name: Socratix AI
long_description:
Socratix builds AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams so that humans don't have to spend their days drowning in alerts and spreadsheets.

Today, fraud and risk teams at fintechs and banks are overwhelmed. Analysts jump between tools, manually stitch together context, and make judgment calls under pressure, often for hundreds of alerts a week. Too much of their work is slow, repetitive, and error-prone. We're here to change that. 

Socratix gives fraud and risk teams AI coworkers that investigate alerts in real time, replacing manual reviews with fast, explainable decisions. Socratix agents plug into existing workflows and reason across signals just like human analysts to help teams reduce fraud losses, minimize false positives, and scale operations without scaling headcount.

We've seen this problem firsthand. At DoorDash, Riya helped save $30M+ a year by building smarter fraud detection and investigation tooling, and at Unit21, she built products for analysts that made them 3X faster. We're able to build and sell enterprise-grade software. At Cruise, Satya built scalable AI systems powering petabyte-scale data, and at LinkedIn, he built enterprise products from 0 to 1 generating $50M+ in incremental revenue. Now, the two of us are teaming up to eliminate the manual toil in fraud and risk.

We're obsessed with fraud, LLMs, real-world automation, and the messy edge cases traditional ML has trouble handling. We believe that every fraud analyst should have an AI coworker - and the future of fraud will involve combining human-level reasoning with machine-speed execution.
one_liner: AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams.

name: Floot
long_description:
Floot lets non-coders & entrepreneurs build real web apps that actually work. We’re taking a new approach by building everything from the ground up for AI.

✨ Try building an app at floot.com

Existing AI app builders fall short of enabling non-coders to build real, serious apps. They often:
- Break down when building anything more than a prototype or toy app
- Have non-coders stuck with errors they don’t understand
- Require non-coders to handle multiple services designed for developers (e.g. for backend, database, hosting, etc)

The fundamental problem: these AI app builders just cobble together existing developer tools and slap AI on top, but these tools were designed for humans and not for AI.

The result? Non-coders get excited, start building, hit a wall, and then abandon their projects.

Floot is purpose-built for AI. Our secret sauce:

1) Instead of reusing a coding framework designed for humans, we created a specialized framework that dictates how AI should write code and how the code runs on our infrastructure. This allows us to enforce best practices, detect errors earlier, and give the best feedback to the AI. As a result, Floot can write better code and fix issues more effectively.

2) Floot has the entire tech stack built-in (backend, database, hosting, etc) so building and managing an app feels seamless, especially for non-coders. And because we control every layer of the stack, we can optimize each layer for AI-first coding.

Because of this, non-coders can get more done with less time and prompting. They can finally build serious apps that work, instead of getting stuck in frustrating error loops and then abandoning their projects.

We also built a highly scalable hosting system directly on AWS so Floot apps can handle real traffic and business demands. This means non-coders can build, deploy, and scale their apps on a single platform seamlessly.

Plus, Floot is really fun to use! Try building an app at floot.com
one_liner: The easiest way for non-coders to build apps with AI.

name: Idler
long_description: Idler builds reinforcement learning environments that teach AI models to code at expert human levels. We create training environments based on real-world coding scenarios that prepare models for the complex challenges they'll face in production.
one_liner: Reinforcement learning environments.

name: Altur
long_description: Voice AI Agents for Debt Collection
one_liner: Voice AI Agents for Debt Collection

name: Metis
long_description: We build infrastructure enabling AI agents to reliably perform complex tasks in production
one_liner: Infrastructure to build reliable agents

name: Sira
long_description:
Sira is the AI-powered platform for managing time tracking, scheduling, payroll, and HR — purpose-built for hourly teams.

Our intelligent agents handle the manual, time-consuming tasks for you — like calling workers to fill open shifts, detecting timesheet anomalies, and streamlining payroll processing.

With Sira, businesses stay organized, compliant, and focused on what really matters — while we take care of the team.
one_liner: AI Native Rippling for Deskless Workers

name: Pally
long_description:
We spend our lives in messaging apps. Slack. iMessage. WhatsApp. We face a constant stream of information, introductions, and things we need to do.

What if you could bring together every message, from every platform, in a Superhuman-like experience, with AI agents that automatically complete your action items?

That’s exactly what we’re building at Pally; a future where you never need to check another inbox again.
one_liner: Intelligent Unified Inbox + Personal CRM

name: Hera
long_description:
Hera is an AI motion designer that turns 5-hour projects into 5-minute tasks. 

When you're a YouTuber making an infographic animation, instead of spending hours manually clicking buttons in Adobe After Effects, you can create the same animation in minutes in Hera. 

Through talking to our users, we realized that 95% of time spent on motion graphics is manual button clicking, not creative work. This insight led us to focus on automating the tedious parts while giving the user all creative control.

We launched in May 2025, got 100k waitlist signups in 8 weeks, and we're doubling revenue monthly.
one_liner: AI Motion Designer

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher is an AI-powered platform that automates creator marketing workflows—from discovery and outreach to campaign management and content strategy—making marketing teams 10x more productive. 

We handle the manual tasks so brands can focus on building relationships with creators while centralizing their operations in one platform to manage creators on TikTok Shop, Instagram, and YouTube.
one_liner: We automate creator marketing for the world's largest brands

name: dScribe AI
long_description:
dScribe AI uses autonomous drones and 3D vision to track bulk inventory. We're starting by helping the ag and mining industry track stockpiles of grain and gravel.

Bulk inventory tracking is broken. Companies either rely on guesstimates or pay for expensive manual surveys which are still off by 30 to 50%. Without accurate numbers, it’s hard to plan logistics, like how many truckloads are needed. And it creates accounting issues by misreporting inventory value, hurting financial planning and leading to missed opportunities.

We’ve lived this problem, and we know how to solve it. Warren saw it firsthand as a Product Manager at Milk Moovement, a $20M Series A AgTech startup, working closely with feed suppliers and farm managers. Cole was engineer #3 at Tropic, scaling it from seed to Series B, and later led engineering at an AI startup.

We’ve built an integrated hardware and software platform and have signed one of the largest agricultural company in North America. As industries demand real-time visibility into the physical world, dScribe AI is positioned to become the system of record for inventory that don’t fit in traditional boxes and barcodes.
one_liner: Computer vision for bulk inventory tracking

name: Fleetline
long_description: Fleetline is building the first complete-context algorithmic load planner for mid to large-sized trucking fleets. Today’s dispatchers face an overwhelming task: balancing regulations, customer demands, live fleet data, and individual driver needs, all while coordinating across siloed tools and teams. Mistakes run rampant, and each mistake is thousands of dollars. Even the select fleets using algorithms that have fleet-wide context struggle: the outputs are rigid, hard to interpret, and are blind to real-world nuances like driver preferences and schedule exceptions. Fleetline solves this by combining advanced optimization with LLMs that can easily adapt algorithms to each fleet’s needs and capture driver-specific information. The result is smarter planning truly optimized for every fleet and its drivers.
one_liner: Optimizing fleet planning with data driven algorithms

name: Magnetic
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

We launched this year in the middle of tax season and quickly processed hundreds of returns, earning thousands in ARR, and since tax season we've been growing customers by >30% month-over-month. We've completely automated over 25% of the return process so far and developed a proprietary vision model that beats incumbent scanning technology by almost 2x on accuracy - jumping from 50% field-level accuracy to 89%, approaching the quality of their expensive human-verified service at 92%.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.
one_liner: AI Tax Preparer for CPA firms

name: TectoAI
long_description: We help your company identify roles that can be filled by agentic AI tools, onboard them quickly, monitor their performance and behavior post deployment, ensure they remain compliant, and aligned with regulations. Tecto is building the governance platform for managing the AI stack!
one_liner: A Platform for AI Governance

name: Interfere
one_liner: Build software that never breaks

name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan uses AI to map every law, regulation, and court case in America, allowing government agencies and businesses to replace massive consulting projects with instant automated analyses. We call this "intelligent legal cartography."

In 3 months, we went from zero customers to Virginia's Executive Order 51, requiring all state agencies to use Vulcan. We are now live with the U.S. Department of Education, a regulatory reform PAC in South Carolina, and have a pipeline of several additional state and federal agencies and major enterprises.

Our initial agency partners use legal cartography to draft lawful regulations, respond to public comments on regulations, and instantly generate mandatory cost-benefit analyses.

We have both public and private sector visions. In the public sector: we endeavor to automate the entire regulatory process end-to-end; replacing the consulting industrial complex with software. In the private sector: we plan to automate regulatory compliance, tackling the $4 trillion regulatory cost on the U.S. economy.
one_liner: AI regulatory drafting and compliance

name: NOSO LABS
long_description: In the home services industry, field technicians are expected to handle three key tasks: diagnosing issues, making sales, and completing paperwork. It's rare to find individuals who excel at all three. We build AI agents to support technicians by improving diagnostic accuracy and helping them capture sales opportunities.
one_liner: Build AI agents for field technicians to diagnose and sell 10x better

name: Veritus
long_description:
Veritus is a omni-channel platform for deploying AI agents for loan servicing and collections, including inbound and outbound voice agents. Our agents negotiate repayment plans, follow up across channels, and drive recoveries with zero human involvement.

By combining cutting edge voice AI with deep regulatory compliance and vertical specialization we're able to drastically reduce the cost-to-collect while increasing recovery rates.
one_liner: AI agents for the consumer lending industry

name: burnt
long_description:
Food Supply Chain companies have been using legacy ERPs for decades. Everyone knows these are necessary evils that essentially run the business but take up a lot of operational capacity. They are not about to just rip and replace their existing system that runs their whole business with a system that takes years to implement. Imagine if they could implement AI that runs the ERP for them, in weeks?

Burnt’s building an agentic OS for the Food Supply Chain with AI Agents for each department. 

Our AI Agent, Ozai, has started by replacing the whole order management job function at food distribution companies, so that sales and customer service teams can focus on what matters - the customer. Ozai monitors all incoming messages (emails, phone calls, voicemails, whatsapp, fax etc.), figures out if it's an order, learns each customer's habits, shorthand, and favorite products, picks up on any prep notes, and enters it straight into the existing ERP. It'll even go back to the customers on your behalf when it's not sure about something, clarify things and carry on working. 

The more it sees, the smarter it gets.
one_liner: Agentic Operating System for Food Supply Chain

name: Luminal
long_description:
Luminal builds an ML framework and compiler that generates GPU code.
Our stack 10x's model speed while simplifying deployment and cutting idle GPU costs

Github: https://github.com/luminal-ai/luminal
Discord: https://discord.gg/APjuwHAbGy
one_liner: Making AI run fast on any hardware.

name: Digipals
long_description:
Social networks are dead. Social media became more media than social. My friends aren't on social media anymore - it's one third ads, one third content from strangers, and one third AI slop. Our social lives are fragmented across dozens of different apps - iMessage, WhatsApp, Find My, Partiful, and Venmo. 

Digipals is the first AI-native social operating system that improves our relationships with friends. We built ambient AI agents that use social context from our location, calendar, and photos to take action and write code in our group chats. We are the last social platform anyone will ever need.

Launch Video
https://youtu.be/KW2tjLl6sxM
one_liner: The future of Social in the age of AI

name: Nox Metals
long_description: Nox Metals is building the fastest metals processing factories in North America. Our software runs quoting, scheduling, and operations to streamline production and reduce cost. We supply America's industrial base with custom-cut material at unmatched speed and efficiency.
one_liner: The modern factory for fast, low-cost metals.

name: F2
long_description:
F2 is the AI platform for private markets investors. Purpose-built for private credit, private equity, and commercial banking, F2 accelerates diligence, underwriting, and portfolio monitoring, helping teams evaluate deals over 60% faster. 

F2 turns unstructured deal data into investment-grade analysis and polished memos in minutes. Unlike general-purpose AI, F2 is built with the domain expertise and depth to handle the most complex financial analysis. Already trusted across thousands of deals, F2 makes collaboration easy and retains historical context, so past work compounds into future wins. 

Headquartered in New York City, F2 is backed by leading investors including NFX, Left Lane Capital, and Y Combinator.
one_liner: The AI platform for private markets investors

name: Uplane
long_description:
Uplane replaces marketing agencies with AI. We generate hundreds of ads with matching landing pages and steer the ad spend across channels like Meta, Google, LinkedIn and others. By connecting to CRM and ERP data, Uplane learns what drives profits and continuously improves campaigns.

Companies waste billions on bad ads, mismatched landing pages, and poor budget allocation. Uplane fixes this by replacing a patchwork of agencies, spreadsheets, and siloed tools with one self-improving system. The result: Higher ROAS for enterprises and effortless, expert-level marketing for SMBs.
one_liner: Replace marketing agencies with AI

name: Structured AI
long_description:
Structured AI is building the AI workforce for construction design engineering, starting with AI agents that perform quality control on technical documents and drawings. Our agents learn your standards, apply the right building codes, and automatically review your drawings, so you see fewer clashes, fewer inconsistencies, and fewer costly RFIs and change orders.

⚙️ Automates QA/QC across mechanical, electrical, structural and more
🧩 Used by multi-disciplinary design firms to deliver projects faster with less risk
🚀 Mission: Free engineers to focus on creative design, not repetitive admin
one_liner: AI workforce for Construction Engineering

name: Brickwise
long_description:
We've built an AI property manager that automates maintenance requests, handling tenant calls and messages 24/7, following up by chasing contractors and resolving issues.

We're based in London, but have over 10 customers throughout the world, from San Francisco to Dubai. We have a reliable sales pipeline, including a >$1m cARR enterprise contract. Since our formation 6 months ago, we have raised over $3M in funding.

Ismail, co-founder & CEO, is an ex-Founder at LiveLink AI, where he raised $3M, growing the platform to editing 150k videos per month. He also built his own prop firm to $500k ARR.

Elias, co-founder & CTO, was an early engineer at a YC backed company, acquired by Google. While a senior engineer at Google for 5 years, he took the product from $50k ARR to >$100m. CS at Bristol, MBA from Imperial.
one_liner: AI property manager for landlords and estate agents
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Bolna AI
long_description:
Bolna handles the complexity of voice infra, so enterprises can automate calls faster, better, and cheaper, at scale

Bolna is a Voice AI Orchestration platform purpose-built for Indian enterprises.
Businesses in India run tens of thousands of calls every day - across sales, support, collections, recruitment, and more. Bolna gives them the power to build and deploy Voice AI Agents directly from their transcripts and FAQs, so they can start automating calls immediately.

With Bolna, enterprises get:

1. Full control over agent intelligence, tone, and workflows
2. Cost efficiency at scale with smart routing across providers and price points
3. Enterprise-grade performance on latency, interruptions, multi-language, and multi-accent understanding
one_liner: Voice AI to enable India's next billion

name: Sorce
long_description: Tinder for Jobs. Swipe right, AI applies on your behalf.
one_liner: Tinder for jobs

name: Hypercubic
long_description:
Hypercubic is an AI-native maintenance and modernization platform for COBOL and mainframes.

We help enterprises understand and preserve their mission-critical legacy systems. About 70% of the Fortune 500 companies still rely on them to run their core business applications in banking, insurance, telecom, airlines, retail, and more.

These systems, originally built in the 1960s–90s, still power trillions in global infrastructure today but have become increasingly opaque as original developers retire or leave the workforce. 

We're laying the foundation to autonomously maintain and modernize these legacy systems to future-proof the backbone of the global economy.


Learn more at hypercubic.ai
one_liner: AI to maintain and modernize COBOL.

name: Wardstone
long_description: Wardstone is a space defense-tech company developing next-generation capabilities to protect the United States and its allies from missiles and other space-based threats. We design, build, and deploy satellites equipped with space-based interceptors to kinetically counter hypersonic and ballistic missiles.
one_liner: Satellites for Missile Defense

name: Flick
long_description:
Flick is an AI filmmaking software that lets people create Hollywood-level short films completely using AI end-to-end.

There are many AI tools that can give you 8-second casual clips to post on social media, but when it comes to creating truly high-quality films with coherent storylines, consistent characters, and cinematic aesthetics, they don’t come close due to their lack of flexibility, creative control, and fragmented creative flow.

Founded by an award-winning filmmaker and a founding engineer at Instagram, Flick defines an interface specifically designed for native AI filmmaking that feels natural and enables end-to-end creative flows. Think of Flick as Figma for AI filmmaking.

There are 4 complete AI short films created using Flick that got 20+ awards in international film festivals already and our early creator residency community are generating several AI short films every week.

We are also building a community where we produce our own AI films as well as collaborating with other well-known filmmakers to share their “behind-the-scenes” workflows as resuable templates to inspire users in our community. We not only build product, we also build world-class content.

The whole film industry will be revolutionized by AI and our goal is to be “the product” that defines this category.
one_liner: Figma + Cursor, for AI Filmmaking

name: Semble AI
long_description:
Semble AI builds AI agents that design building-systems (fire, HVAC, plumbing, security). Construction companies use Semble to cut down weeks on commercial and residential projects. 

The $600B building-system integration industry still runs on spreadsheets and manual drawings, even as building codes rapidly evolve and become more localized. It’s a massive blind spot for the tech world. 

Jonathan and Ethan met studying computer science at Stanford. Jonathan worked at Convergint, one of the world's largest building system integrators, specifically for the purpose of learning how this industry works. Ethan is obsessed for a different reason: His house burned down in 2017 due to a faulty fire system.

They are determined to make Semble the industry standard for construction design.
one_liner: Autonomous building-system design for construction companies.

name: AnswerThis
long_description:
AnswerThis is a scientific discovery platform used by over 200,000 researchers that reduces weeks of manual research work to hours. 

Instead of manually searching, reading, and organizing dozens of papers, researchers use AnswerThis to find the most relevant work, see how ideas are connected, and get comprehensive answers to complex scientific questions with line by line answers. 

This allows them to map research gaps, analyze trends, and draft literature reviews far faster, all while building a searchable library of their own research materials.
one_liner: End-to-end workspace to accelerate scientific discovery

name: SF Tensor
long_description:
AI researchers should be pushing the boundaries of what's possible with new architectures and training methods. Instead, they waste weeks configuring cloud infrastructure, debugging distributed systems, and optimizing their GPU code. We know because we lived it: While training our own models across thousands of GPUs earlier this year, we spent more time fighting our infrastructure than doing actual research.

That why we're building two things. First, Elastic Cloud: a managed platform that automatically finds the cheapest GPUs across all providers, handles spot instance preemption, and cuts compute costs by up to 80%. Second, automatic kernel optimization that makes training code run faster by modeling hardware topology, often beating hand-tuned implementations.

The problem is that getting high performance across different hardware is genuinely hard. NVIDIA's CUDA moat exists because writing fast kernels requires deep expertise. Most teams either accept vendor lock-in or hire expensive kernel engineers. Our goal is to break the CUDA moat.

The compute bottleneck is the biggest constraint on AI progress. NVIDIA can't manufacture enough GPUs, and their monopoly keeps prices astronomical. Meanwhile, AMD, Google, and Amazon are shipping capable alternative hardware that nobody uses because the software is too hard. We're breaking that moat. If we succeed, anyone will be able to train state-of-the-art models without thinking past their PyTorch code.
one_liner: Infrastructure for AI labs to focus on research.

name: Unsiloed AI
long_description:
AI teams spend 6+ months building document workflows, yet fewer than 10% ever reach production. Generic LLM parsers and OCR collapse on multimodal documents with text, tables, images, and charts. Poor parsing and suboptimal chunking cripple RAG pipelines and downstream automation. Unsiloed AI has built state-of-the-art vision models which serves as the infrastructure layer for turning unstructured data into structured, queryable, and LLM-ready assets.

Our APIs are already parsing hundreds of thousands of documents for startups and NASDAQ-listed enterprises, powering vertical AI solutions across industries. On public benchmarks, Unsiloed AI consistently outperforms solutions from LlamaIndex, Gemini, Mistral, and Unstructured.io among others.
one_liner: API for parsing multimodal unstructured data

name: Sunflower
long_description:
Sunflower is on a mission to create one trillion days sober. Our product is both a consumer app (think a "Duolingo for addiction") but also with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 

Consumer App: 
- We built the #1 AI Sponsor for any kind of addiction
- Beautiful visual progression tracking to power the core "task to be done" of addiction
- A twitter style social media for addicts 
- DIY learn content (think Masterclass for addiction) for all major addiction types 
- CBT based journaling exercises 

Tele-Therapy: 
- Think a "Early Medical Peter Attia" quality of clinic, but completely focused on addiction 
- Starting with talk therapy in CA & TX we're rolling out to all 50 states + MAT 
- Bringing together the worlds best doctors to create the most effective protocol for addiction 

Sunflower went from 0 - 100k MAU in less than 6 months, and now we're continuing the traction to create the #1 product for addiction for the 1.2B humans on this planet that struggle with this fundamental human problem.
one_liner: Building the Sobriety Platform for the future of Superintelligence. 🌻

name: Bravi
long_description:
Bravi is building the AI operating system for home-services businesses, using AI-powered customer communication as the wedge.

We replace the front office (calls, chats, follow-ups) with AI agents that never miss a lead, then layer an internal AI copilot that understands products, pricing, and technical documentation.

We started with fenestration (shutters, windows, garage doors), a large, complex vertical with no modern software, before expanding to adjacent trades.

Bravi is already live with leading installers and manufacturers across Europe and the US, turning missed demand into revenue.
one_liner: The AI operating system powering home services businesses

name: Leadbay
long_description:
Leadbay (YC F25) discovers and qualifies SMB leads that couldn't be found before. Small-to-enterprise teams use us to prospect the most low-data-low-signals industries like construction, hospitality, even startups.

Co-founders are Milan Stankovic (CTO) - PhD to make AI work with limited data, and Ludovic Granger (CEO). 

Try us on leadbay.ai.
one_liner: Discover and qualify SMB leads that couldn't be found before.

name: Everest
long_description:
Outsourced IT is a $350B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI employees to help them solve support tickets faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 150K companies globally.
one_liner: AI employees for outsourced IT

name: Absurd
long_description:
Absurd makes AI brand and performance ads at scale. Our last video for Kalshi ("Election Day") did 1M+ views, and we average 300K+ organic views across all videos. 

Our clients also include Replit, Brex, Whop, Reforge, Gumloop, Micro1, and a couple YC and HF0 startups. 

We do this with a multi-agent orchestration layer to create production-quality videos in 72 hours. These agents collaborate with your team to plan and generate every scene on an interactive canvas. From the canvas, your team can watch shot renders come to life in real time — commenting, iterating, or generating new ideas alongside the agents.

Try it today at absurd.com
one_liner: AI Brand and Performance Ads at Scale

name: Kalpa Labs
long_description: We're building the next frontier of speech models. Generalist speech models that unlock in-context learning & strong instruction following for speech models alongside unifying existing speech capabilities like speech to text, text to speech, voice cloning, etc.
one_liner: Scaling Generalist Speech models

name: Metorial
long_description: Metorial is the infra layer for AI integrations. We built the only serverless MCP runtime that can maintain state with sub-second cold starts, built-in security, and monitoring. We make it easy for developers to connect AI agents to apps and data sources at scale.
one_liner: The infra layer for AI integrations.

name: Karumi
long_description:
Karumi is an AI agent that joins a live video call with your prospects to deliver personalized product demos, 24/7, in any language.

It bridges the gap between your landing page and your sales team by engaging visitors at the peak of their interest, turning curiosity into conversion. For those not ready to talk to sales but eager to explore, Karumi offers the next generation of interactive, self-guided demos.
one_liner: The Waymo of Personalized demos

name: Rovi Health
long_description:
We deliver high-quality, cost-effective healthcare to employees through text. Employers cut 10–20% of healthcare spend. Employees get concierge care that improves outcomes.

Our AI agents analyze clinical data to identify care needs. We treat common conditions through our integrated virtual clinic. For more complex care, our agents find the best in-network providers using millions of price and quality data points, and handle end-to-end appointment booking.
one_liner: AI healthcare concierge for employees

name: Miniswap
long_description:
Miniswap a marketplace for complex hobbies, starting with Warhammer.

In hobbies as complex as Warhammer, finding what you want on general marketplaces is a huge pain. Filters don't work, free-form listings mean that products are regularly misidentified, and piles of counterfeit junk crowd search results. 

Miniswap saves hobbyists from this chaos with its catalogue of more than 20,000 unique miniatures. Sellers match their listings against Miniswap's catalogue giving buyers more information and structure as they shop.

The global market for tabletop games is estimated to be worth $20B in 2025 and Warhammer alone is projected to grow to $3B by 2030. By capturing the market in this untapped niche, Miniswap is strongly positioned to bringing greater transparency, simplicity, and connectivity into adjacent verticals.

Miniswap's founding team merges deep domain knowledge with elite programming expertise and years of experience in business consulting and startups. Co-founders Zak and Will met while studying together at Cambridge, bonded over their love of Warhammer and early modern history. They have been best friends ever since.
one_liner: The Marketplace for Complex Hobbies

name: The Hog
long_description:
TheHog.ai is the first predictive intelligence engine for growth. We don't just find leads; we predict your next customer before they enter the market.

TheHog.ai maps your ICP, channels, and opportunities across the internet, monitors competitors, communities, keywords, and turns signals into ranked actionable game plans.

The future of sales isn't a static dashboard; it is a living, autonomous command center. TheHog.ai gives a single operator the power of an entire sales and marketing teams by compressing weeks of research into minutes of execution.

The Hog Mind & Global Graph At our core is "The Hog Mind": a proprietary Contributory Global Graph that fuses real-time social listening with advanced identity resolution. Unlike traditional enrichment tools that rely on stale databases, The Hog monitors millions of live conversations across the internet to identify high-frequency intent signals. This creates a self-reinforcing data flywheel that ranks opportunities and triggers autonomous engagement workflows instantly.

What We Do:

Predictive Buying Intelligence: We map the "Global Graph" of customer nodes to surface opportunities before competitors know they exist.

Autonomous Engagement: An army of AI agents that don't just draft, but identify, verify, and engage with customers across LinkedIn, Reddit, and X.

Deep Data Enrichment: We bridge the gap between anonymous social signals and verified contact data, creating a holistic view of your market.

The Data Flywheel: A bottom-up network where every user interaction cleans and verifies our dataset, creating a defensive moat that gets smarter with every query.

The Result: Win your customers before it’s even a competition
one_liner: AI Demand Gen for Companies

name: DiligenceSquared
long_description:
DiligenceSquared delivers AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions - like the $500k McKinsey reports, but automated, auditable, and at a fraction of the cost.

When Private Equity funds evaluate deals, they pay firms like McKinsey, BCG, and Bain $500K-$1M for market due diligence. The process takes weeks, and the output is a static PowerPoint that's impossible to audit. A single large-cap PE fund can spend >$30M annually on this and the total market is $10B per year.

Our AI agents conduct expert interviews and synthesize insights with every claim linked to source transcripts. No black box, no "trust me" slides, and no 10x mark-up for human labor.

Frederik bought these reports as a Principal at Blackstone. Soren sold them as a Principal at BCG. Harshil is a repeat founder and former Software Engineer at Google. We've seen both sides and know what matters in due diligence - and now we automate it.

Our clients already include 8 leading private equity funds with over $2.4 trillion in combined AUM.
one_liner: AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions

name: Voltair
long_description:
Voltair builds drones that ‘perch’ like birds to recharge on power lines. For this first time, this allows for drones with infinite range. Removing battery swaps is the last step to deploy UAVs autonomously at scale. After building drones for the Air Force and DARPA, Ronan realized this was both practical and technically feasible.

Power utilities are the perfect first customer. Drone inspections identify maintenance concerns before they cause faults. Faults cause power outages, and spark wildfires - like the Eaton Fire in early 2025 where 19 people lost their lives and nearly 10,000 structures were destroyed. Fires bankrupt utilities and make them uninsurable. Autonomous drones can deliver over 20x the inspection coverage for the same cost.

Since June, we’ve validated our core charging tech on a power line, built 5x flying prototypes, and inspected ~2000 poles.

After power companies, we will service rail, road, telecom, real estate and other inspection markets. Insurance and grid traders also want our data product. At scale we are a new infrastructure layer for data on the physical world.
one_liner: Self Charging Drones

name: Bujo AI
one_liner: AI voice & chat agents for sales and customer support at large B2C…

name: Pax Historia
long_description:
Pax Historia is an alternate-history sandbox game where players choose a country, a moment in time, and rewrite the course of history. What if Rome never fell? What if the Soviet Union survived? What if Genghis Khan ruled for another generation?

We go beyond history, too. What if aliens invaded Earth? What if you were a college dropout creating a tech startup? The ability to create, edit, and copy custom maps, actors, historical context, and more means that users can play nearly any scenario they can imagine.

In the last four months we've organically built a passionate fanbase of tens of thousands of daily active players and we're excited to expand on this early start. Consider joining us to help build vastly better tools for creators and experiences for players.
one_liner: The first AI-powered grand strategy platform
